comments.body:
Add comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged: See https://github.com/xor2k/npy-append-array/pull/1
license_file: LICENSE
```

I opened a PR to fix the need to manually package the license file in future in future releases (https://github.com/xor2k/npy-append-array/pull/1). The comment is a visual reminder to check the status of this in the future and to remove the manually packaged version when the license file is included in the source distribution.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged: See https://github.com/xor2k/npy-append-array/pull/1
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
